name: Steven
greetingText: I hope you are having a wonderful day now that you are a quarter of a century old.
wishText: Today is an important day, after all.
textInChatBox: Dear Mr. Steven Proudfoot, I would like to wish you a most pleasant   birthday on this day of days...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But then I changed my mind.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. And don't analyze the code too closely, I may have forked a repo. Dad will be back in SolrÃ¸d from February 20-23, where he can give you your fancy new knife sharpener.
replayText: Or click right here if you want to watch it again.
